Conversations/Bank/Olric/Museum Lines/fa: You've got a good eye for cool rocks.
I was at the museum earlier and I saw that $Faceted Rock Gem$! Did you donate that, [Ari]?
Conversations/Bank/Olric/Museum Lines/ro: Errol said that new fish over at the museum is called a $Rockbiter$... on account of it chews up rocks?
Conversations/Bank/Olric/Museum Lines/sh: Errol told me that the $Shale Grass$ at the museum isn't made of shale at all! It's grass!
Would've been handy back when I worked the Mines.
Too bad about the earthquake messing it up, huh?
Errol showed me that $Shortcut Scroll$ you dropped off at the museum, [Ari]!
